content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Copper Plate Smelting Facility at position (61, -52)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace at position (61.0, -52.0)

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors related to smelting timeout
- Ensure that the furnace has sufficient fuel and the required inputs to avoid smelting timeouts. Check the inventory of the furnace regularly to confirm that it has enough copper ore and fuel.
